Parameters: MediaRouter.RouteInfo: the route affected by this event

int: an integer indicating whether the volume is to be increased (positive value) or decreased (negative value). For bundled changes, the absolute value indicates the number of changes in the same direction, e.g. +3 corresponds to three "volume up" changes.
onVolumeUpdateRequest(android.media.Medi.Description: Called when the volume for the route should be increased or decreased.
onVolumeUpdateRequest(android.media.Medi.FullName: public abstract void onVolumeUpdateRequest (MediaRouter.RouteInfo info, int direction)

Parameters: MediaRouter.RouteInfo: the route affected by this event
int: an integer indicating the new volume value that should be used, always between 0 and the value set by @B_android#media#MediaRouter#UserRouteInfo#setVolumeMax_E@.
onVolumeSetRequest(android.media.MediaRo.Description: Called when the volume for the route should be set to the given value
onVolumeSetRequest(android.media.MediaRo.FullName: public abstract void onVolumeSetRequest (MediaRouter.RouteInfo info, int volume)

ClassDesc: Interface for receiving events about volume changes. All methods of this interface will be called from the application's main thread. A VolumeCallback will only receive events relevant to routes that the callback was registered for.
